title: Risen Leaden Champions 1v1 Tournament (8 weeks)

embed.description: Welcome to the Risen Leaden Champions II (RLCII) 1v1 League of Legends tournament!With the RLC II, we are introducing a...

body:
Hello everyone! Risen eSports will be starting the RLC 1v1 Tournament again, with week 1 beginning this Friday, the 12th of April @ 6PM AEST!

This is an opportunity to prove yourself as the greatest player in OCE (arguably) and take the bragging rights of being RLC champion.

We are aiming for 32 players for this tournament, and a max of 64, this is going to run over 8 weeks, and games will be streamed live.

Prizing:
Prizing is confirmed however the amount is TBA and will be released later in the week via the discord and battlefy. It will be awarded at the end of the 8 week 1v1 league!

To sign-up and learn more, please refer to the link:
https://battlefy.com/risen/rlc-ii-risen-leaden-champions-1v1-league-week-1/5ca715233fcd00036514d4d4/info?infoTab=details&fbclid=IwAR1dG78_dHSuOn8TnbPZZ8hGSvy9xV6q80N4kuW57PRNxq5t6WoFJY9hYRI

Discords:
https://discord.gg/mWhdpdm
https://discord.gg/RcyUX9A

Thankyou, we hope to see you there with us on the day!
If you do have any inquiries, do feel free to ask me about them.
